data.name: Barn Finders VR Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
In Barn Finders there are some elements not suitable for young audience:

- Drinking alcohol,
- Covered nudity on inanimate objects - doll and posters
- Immature humor
